attributes.action: Homework stopped all across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to stop/reduce homework for schools across the UK because it can help student's mental health and relax more, it can make also teachers' life easier so they don't have to give homework out and plan it. Students sometimes can't even take their minds off homework.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to stop homework, this will reduce stress. A recent experiment shows that 70% of the students at a school say homework is too stressful for them. Homework is not useful at all and most students do not put any effort into it. We want homework to be reduced or stoped!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
